This is my post on ThoughtWorks Insights on Enabling Trunk Based Developement With Deployment Pipelines

frontmatter.title: Trunk Based Development With Deployment Pipelines
frontmatter.description: The popular 'Gitflow' branching model causes more harm than good. How can we effectively develop and deploy software with confidence?
